description.value: ChatGPT fails to follow lexical constraints

references:
Gwern wrote a really excellent analysis of why ChatGPT struggles with these constraints: https://www.gwern.net/GPT-3#bpes

Moreover, I wrote a whole paper about how to make Language Models capable of following these kinds of constraints: https://paperswithcode.com/paper/most-language-models-can-be-poets-too-an-ai

description.value: When prompting ChatGPT with lexical constraints, e.g. "Generate a text without the letter "e" in it", ChatGPT almost always fails to follow these constraints.
